CO2EqN2O.Description: CO2 equivalent of N2O-N (100 year. IPCC(2007)=265 er kg CO2eq pr kg N2O, dermed er kg CO2eq pr kg N = 265*(2*14+16)/(2*14) = 416.4

ErrorToleranceYield.Description: Maximum difference between expected and modelled DM yield of crops

ErrorToleranceGrazing.Description: Maximum proportional difference between grazed crop DM and grazed crop intake

fert_EFNH3_IPCC.Description: Emission factor for NH3 and NOx - IPCC (2006)
fert_EFNH3_IPCC.Units: kg NH3-N or NOx-N/kg fertiliser N

man_EFNH3_IPCC.Description: Emission factor for NH3 and NOx - IPCC (2006)

adaptationTimePeriod.Description: Minimum length of the period over which flows will be calculated when using adaptation mode

minimumTimePeriod.Description: Minimum length of the period over which flows will be calculated when using projection mode

ErrorToleranceYield.Description: Maximum difference between expected and modelled DM yield of crops
